inscription:
Inscriptions; Decals

on front of base: [COMMEMORATING COMDR. ALAN B. SHEPARD'S FIRST FLIGHT FROM AMERICA INTO OUTER SPACE MAY 5 1961 15 MIN. HT. 115 MI. DIST. 300 MI. APPROX]; on base: [DURO MOLD AND MFG. INC/ DETROIT 34 MICH./ PAT. PENDING/ USA AND CANADA/ THE/ SATELLITE BANK]

decal on front: [...THE BANK OF TUCSON...]; decal on back: [COMMEMORATING/ LT. COL. JOHN H. GLENN JR'S/...]
title: Satellite mechanical bank
